name: Gaia Earth: Alpha Test
description:
Gaia Earth : Alpha Test. The alpha test for Gaia Earth, a survival single player game coming soon. In Gaia, you play as a man lost in a world full of monsters. You must guide him in his adventure as he survives and thrives in this world.

Notice:

This game is heavily in development and does not represent the final product. Please send me feedback about any bugs, glitches, or improvements I can make in the comments, I will try to get back to you.
